alert.note: Alert for Collin; Hunt; Kaufman; Rockwall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 7:47PM CDT until June 11 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR EASTERN ROCKWALL...SOUTHWESTERN HUNT...NORTHEASTERN KAUFMAN AND SOUTHEASTERN COLLIN COUNTIES... At 747 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Royse City, or 11 miles east of Rockwall, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rockwall, Greenville, Royse City, Fate, Quinlan, Caddo Mills, Hawk Cove, Mobile City, Lake Tawakoni, McLendon-Chisholm, Nevada, Union Valley and Cash. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
